text: Mario Salieri (born November 29, 1957) is an Italian pornographic movie director and producer. He was born in Naples, Italy. Salieri started his adult movie career with semi-amateur movies shot in Amsterdam for the Italian market. Since the early 1990s, he has directed and written many adult erotic titles.
